content: saint anthony cable mittens by heideh sarfehjoo size adult medium materials approximately 130 yards of bulky weight yarn i used lamb s pride bulky us size 9 or 10 circular needles or dpns or size needed to obtain gauge cable needle or dpn yarn needle for weaving in ends gauge 3 4 stitches per inch in stockinette notes cable row are in bold i ve written the directions with a slash between sections back of mitten / front of mitten abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together p2tog purl 2 stitches together ssk slip 2 stitches knitwise one at a time to right needle insert left needle into the front of the stitches and then knit the 2 stitches together 1 c4f slip 2 stitches onto the cable needle and hold in front of work knit the next 2 stitches then knit the 2 stitches from the cable needle c4b slip 2 stitches onto the cable needle and hold in back of work knit the next 2 stitches then knit the 2 stitches from the cable needle m1l with the left needle lift the strand between the stitches from front to back and knit through the back loop m1r with the left needle lift the strand between the stitches from back to front and knit through the front loop psso pass slipped stitch over knitted stitch and off of right needle pattern left mitten cast on 30 stitches the first 14 stitches are the back of the mitten 2 stitches will be added later and the next 16 stitches are the front of the mitten cuff join and knit in the round as follows row 1-6 p2 k2 x3 p2 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 7 p2 k2 x3 p2 / k2 p2 c4f c4b p2 k2 8 p2 k2 x3 p2 / k2 p2 k8 p2 k2 9-10 p2 k2 x3 p2 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 11 k1 m1l k12 m1l k1 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 12-13 k16 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 14 k16 / k2 p2 c4f c4b p2 k2 start gusset 15 k14 m1l k1 m1r k1 / k2 p2 k8 p2 k2 16 k18 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 17 k14 m1l k3 m1r k1 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 2 18 k20 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 19 k14 m1l k5 m1r k1 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 20 k22 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 21 k14 m1l k7 m1r k1 / k2 p2 c4f c4b p2 k2 22 k24 / k2 p2 k8 p2 k2 23 k14 m1l k9 m1r k1 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 24 k26 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2 25 k14 m1l k11 m1r k1 / k2 p2 k2 p1 x2 k2 p2 k2
